name: Goalie VR
description:
Feature List
  • 5 vs 1 Hockey Action
    Take on up to 5 players in the Hailstone Arena!
  • Create Your Own Plays
    Position your opponents wherever you want in the offensive zone!
  • Full Body Motion with the HTC Vive Trackers
    Make acrobatic saves or stack the pads just like the pros!
  • Real-Time Multiplayer
    Face off against your friends using our GoalieVR Mobile App.

Experience the adrenaline rush of defending your goal against 5 opposing players, an unrealistic but FUN experience. Play against AI or your friends (requires a compatible mobile device).
